SummaryEnglish: Set in the near future (2122), Medabots revolves around the super-charged battling adventures of a group of kids and their unique, high performance pet robots (a.k.a. Medabots). Fueled with artificial intelligence and a specialized arsenal of unique interchangable weapons, Medabots compete against each other in exciting Robattles. However, after the world robattle has ended a new robot group, known as Kilobots, has appeared and begun taking the fun out of robattles, because they play by no rules. How will this affect the World Robattle Championships held every four years?

1.SummaryEnglish: In the year 2122, a young boy named Ikki does not have a Medabot while everybody else does.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and Metabee don't get along so well and Henry explains why. Ikki starts to understand why and decides to Ro-Battle the Screws.

3.SummaryEnglish: Ikki's middle school gym teacher makes him and the Screws do A LOT of running, but when Ikki and Erika find out the gym teachers big secret, they decide to investigate.

4.SummaryEnglish: Erika finds out about a ""legendary medafighter"" that supposedly goes to a snobby rich kids private school, so she and Ikki sneak in and go on a search to find him.

5.TitleEnglish: The Old Man and the Sea Monster
5.SummaryEnglish: The 'Old Man' helps Ikki and Metabee fight on water to to beat the bad bully-meanies.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and Erika find out that there are ghosts stealing medals in a forest so they decide to check it out. There they find Karen and Koji who are also looking for the 'Gimmie Ghost' as he is called.

7.SummaryEnglish: Spyke and Cyandog never seem to win a Ro-Battle so Samantha kicks him them out of the Screws gang. Spyke and Cyandog ask Metabee and Ikki for training help and they find out that Cyandog is terrible at battle because he has the wrong type of medal.

8.SummaryEnglish: It is time for the 10th Annual Medabot Citywide Ro-Battle. Ikki and Metabee want to enter but of course they can't get along and Metabee refuses to listen to Ikki in the Ro-Battles. They both manage to get to the finals anyway but the final test is Koji and Sumilidon. Can Ikki and Metabee get a grip and defeat Koji and Sumilidon. Find out in Part 2.

9.SummaryEnglish: Metabee and Ikki are still furious at each other, so Metabee decides not to listen to Ikki. Even though Ikki tries to help Metabee, Metabee tunes him out and loses the Ro-Battle. After the defeat, Metabee's medal pops out of the robot leaving it to be stollen by the Rubber Robo Gang. They manipulate Metabee to join the Rubber Robo Gang. Is it over for Ikki and Metabee?

10.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious Medabot has come to town. This Medabot goes by the name Rokusho. Ikki and his pals see him saving a puppy and they realise that he is faster than any Metabot they ever seen. Metabee finds out that Rokusho is a loner Medabot with his past shrouded in mystery.

11.SummaryEnglish: Ikki is accused to be the Phantom Renagade by a reporter, so the reporter follows him everywhere and even starts to mimic the Phantom in the hopes that Ikki will reveal his secret. But then the real Phantom comes out into the open seeking revenge.

12.SummaryEnglish: Angry moms that don't like Medabots are stealing kids' Medabots and pack them away. Ikki and Metabee talk some sense to the mean mothers and they get a grip and everyone lives happily ever after. For now, anyway.

13.SummaryEnglish: The Rubber Robo Gang comes up with a plan to use Ikki and Metabee to steal a super rare medal from Dr. Aki him self, who is the creator of all Medabots and also Karin's uncle.

14.SummaryEnglish: The Rubber Robo Gang tries to steal a rare medal from the Medabot Corporation. Inside, the Rubber Robo Gang steals Belzega, a Medabot that has one-hit-beats-him attack. Dr. Aki, realizing that the Rubber Robo Gang wants all the rare medals of the world, appoints the Phantom Renegade to protect them.

15.SummaryEnglish: Rokusho meets Ainsley, a woman that lost her husband in a war, and they start to become friends.

16.SummaryEnglish: Rokusho finds out that Dr. Aki was the one that set fire to Dr. Hushi's house and Rokusho gets very angry. Metabee tries to protect Dr. Aki and has to Ro-Battle Rokusho. When Metabee is about to win, Rokusho uses the 'Medaforce' to pummel Metabee into oblivion.

17.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Meta-Evil's super strong bot, the Robo-Emperor, starts wreaking havoc and Rokusho gets kidnapped by the Rubber Robo Gang and is taken to a ship where they hope to get a rare medal. Ikki finds more info on rare medals and discovers that Dr. Hushi was the first to find out that the Medaforce comes from a Medabot's rare medal.

18.SummaryEnglish: The preliminary rankings for top Medafighters off Japan is out. Ikki is #3, Koji is #2, and Space Medafighter X is #1. Ikki starts showing off for the cameras and Samantha (Leader of the Screws) claims that she taught Ikki all he knows.

19.SummaryEnglish:
Ikki and Erika go exploring when they find Spyke and Krosserdog attacked. They claim that a big Medabot attacked them. Afterwards, Samantha and other Medafighters blame Ikki for attacking their Medabots. They come to a conclusion that Metabee has been cloned.

Meanwhile, Koji is knitting a sock, because nobody has challenged him to a Ro-Battle.

20.SummaryEnglish: As the story returns to where it left off last episode, we see the mysterious Medabot reveal itself. It is a KBT type, Arcbeetle, and it belongs to the number 1 Medafighter in Japan, Space Medafighter X. Space Medafighter X challenges Shrimpy Lipowitz and wins easily, winning back Ikki's medal. As he returns the medal, he lectures Ikki that he should never fight for medals, only medaparts.

21.SummaryEnglish: After seeing Ikki and Metabee use the Medaforce, Koji decides to train harder than ever to be prepared in case he ever has to face it. Space Medafighter X shows up to help him learn a special technique, the "Shadow Sword", which will help him to do this.

22.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and Metabee have to decide what to do. Do they want to make the rankings for the Medabots Ro-Battle Championships or does he want to save his mom?

23.SummaryEnglish: It's the day of the final standings for the World Robattle Tournaments and Ikki Tenryo is still in fourth place. With only 20 minutes until the closing of the rankings, Metabee is exhausted and the only new Medafighter nearby is Space Medafighter X.

24.SummaryEnglish: The Rubbe Robo Gang swoops down and bot-naps Metabee. Because he is exhausted, he cannot fight back. They take Metabee to their secret hideout by helicopter.

25.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Meta-Evil uses Metabee's medal to control every Medabot in the world! Brass starts to attack Erika and Karin and Kantaroth starts attacking Rintaro and his group. Dr. Meta Evil was once Dr. Hushi's assistant. Dr. Hushi found out the power of the rare medals and he wanted to destroy all his research and findings, but Dr. Meta-Evil stole the information to use it for evil.

26.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Meta-Evil looks to be finished. But is he? A strange cat puts a rare medal in to a huge Medabot and it takes Metabee, Rokusho, and ArcBeetle to fight him. Even when all 3 of them use the Medaforce, it doesn't seem to stop Giganko. Giganko goes into town destroying everything in sight. Not even the Police can stop this Medabot. Is all hope lost?

1.SummaryEnglish: When no one believes that an UFO landed on her front yard, Erika tries to bring out the truth, while the Rubber Robo Gang makes money selling Alien merchandise.

2.SummaryEnglish: Samantha has a hard choice to make. Give up Ro-Battling, so she could stay with her "true love" (who doesn't like Medabots) or forget about him and continue as a Medafighter. She decides to quit Ro-Batting for Nathan, who doesn't like Medafighters because he lost to Samantha years ago. Now, Samantha has an even harder decision to make. Will she lose on purpose to regain her true love's spirit back?

3.SummaryEnglish: Karin is having a costume party and invited everyone, from Ikki, Erika, and Metabee to Samantha and the rest of the Screws. Koji got an invite too and he decides to confess his love to Karin at her party. Just as he's about to confess his love, the Rubber Robo Gang crashes the party and with all the confusion, Koji accidentally confesses his love to Samantha.

4.SummaryEnglish: A snow storm causes the school to be closed. Ikki and Erika are having a snowball fight with the Screws, and don't hear the no-school announcement. Still thinking they have school, Ikki, Erika, and the Screws all report to school and are surprised to find no one there.

5.SummaryEnglish:
Koji feels he has no chance against Ikki since Metabee can summon the Medaforce. Space Medafighter X agrees to show Koji just how to beat that force.

Meanwhile, Squidguts has been put in charge of the Rubberobo Gang and their quest to grab all of the Rare Medals. He has planted himself on a pedestrian bridge making anyone who wishes to pass Robattle his bot Gobanko. A loss to Gobanko would mean the loser must give up his Medal. Even Coach Mountain and Digmole couldn't defeat him.

Karin, who is looking to share her spicy squidballs with Ikki, approaches the bridge and tries to do everything she can to keep everyone happy. First she has a crosswalk built, and then she sets up a Grand Prix. Finally, Ikki arrives and sees the cause of the problems is Squidguts and a Robattle is called.

Metabee's double launch missiles are blocked by Gobanko who then wraps Metabee in a chain and causes massive damage to his head and torso. In addition, Metabee's Missiles are inoperative. Suddenly, Metabee notices there is damage to the precious bridge which causes him to summon the Medaforce and defeat Gobanko.

After the battle, Rintaro races up to Ikki and informs him of Space Medafighter X's intention to help Koji. Is there really a way to defeat the Medaforce? We'll soon find out!

6.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and Erika decide to do a report on Medabots and Medafighters for school. Metabee finds a Mermaidl Medal while strolling. The peeps put the medal in to Brass and the find out that this medalwas lost when her Medafighter had to move somewhere else, and forgot her medal. Metabee insists on finding Oceana to her Medafighter Hannah. When they find her, they find out that Oceana's body was lost during the move too. Erika, being the great invstigator she is, located the guy who found Oceana's body, but he refuses to give ot back. Now Metabee has to Ro-Battle Kuraba, a Crab type Medabot, to win her body back.

7.SummaryEnglish: When Ikki wins two free tickets to popular Ninja Park, Erika persuades him to take her as his free guest.  Ikki's first choice was Karin, but Erika wants to do a story on the park.  Ikki reluctantly agrees because Erika took one ticket and wouldn't give it back.  The main attractions to the park are the Explosive Ninja Show that features Ninja-Type Medabot Nin-Ninja and Kunoichi (Female Ninja)-Type Medabot Icknite, as well as the Ninja Castle that says closed for renovations.  Disappointed, Ikki and Erika proceed to the Ninja Show. As the Ninja Show begins, Ikki and Erika notice that the monsters in the show look very much like the Rubberobo Gang.  Seaslug has decided to hold Ikki and Erika captive until renovations are completed on their new base Ninja Castle!  The Rubberobo Gang has stolen the Medals of Nin-Ninja and Icknite, and has complete control over them.  Intuitively knowing that Ikki and Erika are in trouble, Metabee and Sailor-Multi (nicknamed Brass) come to their rescue. As

8.SummaryEnglish: While traveling across the nation, training to become the best in the country, a Medafighter stops at Ikki's home.  He is looking for a blue and white Medabot that interrupted his training in the mountains.  The Medafighter tells Ikki that over 100 Medabots attacked him at one time and defeated his Kintaro-Type Medabot Kintaro.  He can't remember seeing an Medafighter, and only remembers a white and blue Medabot with horns. A blue and white Medabot with no Medafighter?  That description fits Rokusho, but he can't possibly be the one that did this terrible thing, can he?  When Rokusho is confronted, the truth is revealed - it was  indeed Rokusho who interrupted their training, but for good reason.  Acting alone, Rokusho did this because they were cutting down trees during their training.  He stopped their training not with force but with compassion.  This sounds more like the Rokusho that we know!

9.SummaryEnglish: Spring is in the air, and like flowers, the hearts of men are blooming for Miss Mimosa, a popular teacher at Ikki's school.  Coach Mountain, Squidguts, and the local florist, Mr. Richards all want to confess their love for Miss Mimosa but are too shy.  Not surprisingly, Mr. Richards tries to express his feelings with flowers.  But now someone is stalking Miss Mimosa by making crank telephone calls, following her home and breaking into her classroom. They discover that Mr. Richards' Medabot Flower-Type Medabot FLORO is the culprit.  He tried to act as a go-between by calling her at home and visiting the school, all in an attempt to bring Mr. Richards and Miss Mimosa together.  Then, just like his Medafighter, FLORO became shy and nervous when he approached her.

10.SummaryEnglish: Penguins are cute with their black and white bodies and small wings, and the unique way they waddle when they walk.  When they stare at you with those beady eyes, it just takes your breath away!  Along with a little boy named Paco and his Medabot Pingen, Ikki and his friends break into a strange animal park operated by the Rubberobo Gang to help send hundreds of penguins back to their home in Antarctica.  Pingen, a Penguin Type Medabot that is not suited for battle because of its weak armor, was a present from Paco's dad in Antarctica to keep Paco company while he is away. Rubberobo's plan was to build a zoo to raise funds for taking over the world!  The mistake was trying to make a zoo with only penguins.  Their bizarre plans were spoiled when Pingen, Paco and his new friends succeed in setting the penguins free.  Ikki and the others are happy to help send the penguins home to Antarctica, but hate to say goodbye to Pingen.

11.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and Metabee are being trained by Dr. Aki to become top-level, highly skilled fighters for Robattle. The doctor visits a friend of his, Kailey, the famous stunt pilot. Kailey and her Plane-Type Medabot Femjet are practicing their aerodynamic moves when Femjet is unable to pull out of a dive and crashes into the forest. Kailey explains that three months ago at the City Airshow, she made a mistake on her landing and Femjet crashed badly. Ever since that crash, Femjet has been afraid of flying. Ikki suggests that Metabee and Femjet train together so Metabee can learn flying battle techniques while Femjet regains her confidence and aero-form. Kailey flat out rejects Ikki's offer. Feeling slighted, he challenges her to a Robattle. She agrees, and Mr. Referee officially declares the start of the match. Unfortunately, Metabee has only homemade aero-parts to use, and is unable to move. He ultimately defeats himself with his own missiles! Observing how easily Femjet defeats Metabee, the Rub

12.SummaryEnglish: In Ikki's neighborhood, a cart from Osaka that sells fried octopus balls sets up shop.  Despite their good taste, Ikki voices his discontent, since he is a connoisseur of fried octopus balls. Natalie was upset and stayed up all night trying to perfect her recipe. The next day, she was enjoying a good crowd around her cart and again Ikki stopped by to taste her product. Unfortunately, he was once again not satisfied by the taste.  Giving Natalie Ikki's attention and valuable advice, Natalie does not get upset, but instead falls in love with Ikki. Natalie is greatly troubled when she finds out that Ikki is ranked third in the nation of all Medafighters.  Natalie must decide between her affection for Ikki, and her desire to eliminate him from the competition so she can compete in the World Robattle Tournament and promote her father's fried octopus ball recipe. Very distracted by the smell of fried octopus balls, Ikki almost loses a Robattle to the Clam-Type Octoclam Medabot.

13.SummaryEnglish: Spyke and Cyandog argue with each other and the two end up going their separate ways, with Cyandog deciding to join The Rockers. Determined not to show how much he misses his old Medabot, Spyke buys a Krosserdog Medabot but it just isn't the same without his old buddy. The two eventually reunite, but the turn of events leaves Cyandog's medal in Krosserdog's body, giving Spyke his old friend in a new way.

14.SummaryEnglish: As competitors from around the world gather for the start of the World Robattle Championships, Mr Referee is shocked to be informed of a new rule for the contest. As Ikki and Koji meet up, they worry that Space Medafighter X might not turn up for the competition and that they will be disqualified, however Ikki and Metabee have more important things to worry about when they immediately get off on the wrong foot with world champion Victor of Team Kenya. When Ikki learns that an exhibition match between Team Kenya and Team Japan will be held during the opening ceremonies, he and Metabee look forward to taking Victor on, until Space Medafighter X fails to turn up for the opening ceremony. As the teams are all introduced, Mr Referee reluctantly announces the new ruling for the championship, that the loser of each robattle must give up their medal to the winner. The stunned players take in the news as the exhibition match begins, but with Space Medafighter X still a no show, Team Japan is ab

15.SummaryEnglish: After their near defeat in the exhibition match, Ikki and Koji are worried about how they will fare in the championship, especially as Space Medafighter X still hasn't turned up. While the two start arguing about who is going to be team leader, they rescue a little girl from the Caribbean team and let her watch them training. When the robattle begins later that day, Karen has to take MedaX's place yet again, but as the robattle begins they realise that the girl they helped was actually the daughter of Team Caribbean's leader. As the Caribbean rips through Team Japan, the three have to work together in order to defeat their opponents and make it through to the next round. With the three friends finally working together, Henry decides that it is time for the real Space Medafighter X to make his appearance, but how will the team fare against the rest of the opposition.

16.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and Koji become suspicious when they learn that Tem France has won all of their matches by default because their opponents have failed to turn up. When Metabee's medal goes missing, the gang suspects that Team France have stolen it, but find that their opponents are able to dress up like other people, making them hard to catch. As the gang tries to recover their medals, Team France kidnaps Karin, so Samantha has to stand in as Space Medafighter X, but as the Robatlle prepares to begin, the real Space Medafighter X (a.k.a Phantom Renegade) has switched places with one of the members of Team France and so the team has to forfeit the match, meaning that Team Japan advances automatically.

17.SummaryEnglish: Samantha is training for both the comming robattle AND a ballet recital. To make matters worse they're sceduled on the same day. Samantha really wants to impress her mom, but she doesn't want to disapoint her team.

18.SummaryEnglish: As Team Japan prepares for their fourth round match against Team Sweden, Ikki, Koji and Sloane (Space Medafighter X) are all infatuated by the three beautiful girls that make up the team. As Spyke and the girls try to snap them out of it, it seems like there is nothing they can do to get the guys to practice. When the match begins, it seems like Team Sweden is in for an easy victory, until the Phantom Renegade reveals that Team Sweden are actually male Rubberrobo Gang members dressed up like beautiful women. Furious that they have been tricked so easily, Metabee wipes out his opponents using the Medaforce, taking Team Japan through to the final eight.

19.SummaryEnglish: Ikki, Koji and Spyke (Space Medafighter X) find themselves up against Team Egypt in the quarter finals, but when the leader of the team, Patra, warns them that they can't win until they identify their weakest link, Koji is sure that she means Spyke because he has the weakest Medabot. As the three begin training, Spyke tries his hardest but Koji tells him to just stay out of the way and leave him and Ikki to do the robattling. However as the robattle begins and Team Egypt takes an early lead, Patra informs Koji that he is the weakest member of the team. As a stunned Koji tries to take in what his opponent has told him, it's up to Spyke to save the day and stop Team Egypt from winning the robattle. Meanwhile, Ikki and Rintaro learn about the Ten Days of Darkness that occurred during the WRC eight years ago and Ikki is stunned to learn that the competitor who caused the incident (the same Henry who Rintaro is obsessed with) caused the Ten Days while using a Metabee.

20.SummaryEnglish: Stunned by the news that Hikaru Agata and Metabee caused the Ten Days of Darkness at the WRC eight years ago, Ikki and the others head off to find Henry, certain that he knows more than he is letting on about the incident. On the way, Ikki explains that Henry suggested the name Metabee, and he thinks that Henry and Hikaru may be one and the same. While the gang have no luck finding Henry, Koji is in shock after seeing how he almost let the team down against Patra and Team Egypt. As a disheartened Koji wonders how he can help the team without being able to use the Medaforce, a confrontation between Joe, the leader of Team USA, and Space Medafighter X results in the real Medafighter agreeing to fight in the semi-finals. As the robattle begins, Koji is unable to fight and Team Japan looks set for an early defeat, but as Arcbeetle seemingly destroys both Team USA's Medabots and Metabee as well, Sumilodon jumps in, rescuing his team mate. Determined not to lose, Joe reveals his secret move,

21.SummaryEnglish: Team Japan's day off goes in unsuspected ways when Dr Aki insists that he check out why Sumilodon was able to use the Medaforce. Leaving Koji behind, Ikki and Erika head off in search of Team Iceland to check out the competition, but Erika soon falls in love with team leader Belmont. When Belmont falls ill saving Erika, she feels guilty that he might not be able to compete and pleads with Victor to postpone the match but he refuses. The match goes on as planned and although Belmont fights valiantly, Warbandit is too powerful and Team kenya wins the second place in the finals, taking Orkamar's medal as their prize. While Belmont mourns the loss, Ikki vows to win back the medal by defeating Victor in the finals, however Brass tries to explain that Warbandit told her that Victor does not want to take the medals, but is doing it for another reason.

22.SummaryEnglish: As Team Iceland recovers from their defeat, everyone is in shock as the board of directors for the World Medabot Corporation reveals themselves to be the Rubberrobo Gang. While Ikki tries to take in the news, Koji is pleased to hear that Sumilodon should be fine to battle in the finals, however things won't be easy against the World Champion, Victor. Seeing the Robos on television, Miss Caviar recognises Seaslug as the man she fell in love with and tries to talk to him, but when he ignores her she vows revenge, forcing Dr Aki and the Phantom Renegade to let her be Space Medafighter X in the final round. Meanwhile Rokusho learns tyhat Victor has been hired by the Rubberrobos and warns Ikki, who confronts Victor when Mrs Tenryou accidentally invites him home for dinner. During the meal, Victor tells Ikki more about the horrors of the Ten Days of Darkness, but even after hearing his warnings, Ikki is still determined to beat Victor and wim back Orkamar's medal for Belmont. As Team Japan p

23.TitleEnglish: Taking the Victor Out of Victory (1)
23.SummaryEnglish: As the finals of the WRC begin, Miss Caviar (as Space Medafighter X) heats things by making a special announcement to the head of the Medabot Corporation, Seaslug. If Team Japan wins the Cup, then Seaslug must quite the Rubberrobos, however if Team Kenya wins, Miss Caviar will join the Robos. As the robattle begins, both teams are on top form and it looks like it could be anyone's game. But as the two teams fight on, Medabots are destroyed one-by-one until only Metabee and Warbandit are left. A crushing blow from Warbandit almost destroys Metabee and in the process fries Ikki's medawatch. Certain that he has won, Victor prepares to leave the stage, but Metabee refuses to give up, summoning the Medaforce to eliminate his opponent. But when Warbandit also summons the Medaforce, the two blasts hit each other head on and the stadium is filled with light...

24.SummaryEnglish:
The violent combination of Metabee and Warbandit's Medaforce blasts shakes the whole stadium, as, far beneath the arena, Rokusho and the Phantom Renegade discover that the Rubberrobo Gang's hideout has been beneath the Medadome all along. They discover a massive resonating antenna, and the Phantom recognises the truth, racing to tell Doctor Aki while Rokusho takes on a team of Whitesords.
Warbandit and Metabee, meanwhile, appear caught in a state of suspended animation, and, in a dream state, deep in the recess of his own mind, Metabee sees a world devastated by war. Victor and Ikki bring their Medabots around, but the strength of their robattle spirit is affect both their medals, and the medals of all the other Medabots around them - and the Phantom Renegade suddenly appears to explain why! The entire stadium is a gigantic resonance device, harnessing the energies of the rare medals and spreading it's effect to all the medals within. The Phantom warns that if the battle does not stop,

25.SummaryEnglish:
Metabee finds himself in a paradise... a world of Medabots, but no humans, where a Medabot who is apparently Brass calls him ""Kyuumu.""
Doctor Meta-Evil reveals that he thinks of himself as a Medabot, having cybernetically enhanced his body. Then, he delivers the ultimate revelation...
Eons ago, the beings that we now know as Medabots were the rulers of the Earth. But they were obsessed with battle and war - to evolve and fight, they modified their bodies into robotic, metal, armored forms. But their war decimated both their race and the world, and so the survivors encoded their minds into small metallic hexagons - Medals - so that when the world was returned to life, they might live again, too. But when this race was returned to life, they were no longer what they had been - now they were Medabots.
It is within his own memories of this past time that Metabee's mind now resides, as he and Rokusho's former self battle each other as generals of opposing armies. Metabee is forced to kill R

26.SummaryEnglish:
Doctor Meta-Evil has unleashed his ultimate weapon - the colossal Medabot, Babby-Blue! But Doctor Aki is ready this time - after the las time Meta-Evil played the giant Medabot card, he had a Giant Metabee constructed.
Metabee is unable to generate enough power to mobilise his giant likeness, and realises that they need - ""More Medabots, More Power!"" Brass, Peppercat, Neutranurse, Sumilidon, Totalizer, Kantaroth and Cyandog all board the Giant Metabee and help to pilot it into battle with Babby-Blue, in a submission robattle refereed by Mr. Referee, who's determination has been restored by the peddler. But even this combination of strength can't breach Babby-Blue's forcefield. Metabee's determination to win draws on the power of the medals of Medabots from all over, unlocking the dormant power within all medals, both rare and clone. A Medaforce blast generated by this energy shatters Babby-Blue's forcefield, but fails to damage the Medabot itself. Metabee knows what he has to do to win

1.SummaryEnglish: When new robots known as Kilobots start appearing, Ikki and Metabee must prove why they finished second at the World Robattle Championships, but what will they do when the Medaforce doesn't work against these Kilobots?

2.SummaryEnglish: When Ikki and Metabee promise not to robattle until Metabee's faulty parts are repaired, they discover it takes as much courage and skill to avoid a fight as it does to seek one out.

3.TitleEnglish: What the World Needs Now [a.k.a. Who is the Mystery Medafighter]
3.SummaryEnglish: Ikki shows the mystery Medafighter how his obsession with destroying the kilobots makes him become similar to Kam, as they both treat their medabots as simple objects of destruction.

4.SummaryEnglish: Always help your folks. Chores can be fun and may lead to adventure!

5.SummaryEnglish: ERIKA must choose between her integrity and journalistic success when she competes with Kam and his kilobot, Fotoshoot, in â€˜best scoop' contest.

6.SummaryEnglish: When Medabots and Kilobots start becoming zombies, it's up to Ikki and Metabee to save the day, but can Ikki overcome his fear of zombies to give Metabee strength?

7.SummaryEnglish: Tak and Ikki learn that hard work and practice will always come before trickery and brute powerâ€¦especially in Robattling!

8.SummaryEnglish: In order to fufill his mission to destroy all Kilobots, MysteryMedafighter accepts the ultimate Kilobot from Kam. But is the cost too high?

9.SummaryEnglish: Mystery Medafighter uses his near-invincible kilobot, Exor, to defeat Ikki, Metabee and anyone else who gets in his way. But does he have the heart to destroy his own medabot, Roks?

10.SummaryEnglish: Metabee learns he can Medachange into Demolition Mode.  But will this be enough to stop the powerful Kilobot, Redrun, who is rampaging through the city?

11.SummaryEnglish: First impressions can be deceiving. Everyone deserves a second chance.

12.SummaryEnglish: New Medabots are created to fight against the Kilobots, but when Metabee's original body is stolen choas begins.

13.SummaryEnglish: In order to keep his secret, Ginkai captures Honey, but before he can erase her memory, Metabee rescues her. Now who will rescue him...?

14.TitleEnglish: A Night In The Medabot Junkyard
14.SummaryEnglish: Ikki, Metabee, Totalizer and Sloan learn that friendship is more important than winning matches...it also lasts a lifetime.

15.SummaryEnglish: Memories of his old medabot, Bayonet cause Ginkai to enter an official robattle tournament where he is forced to choose between his honour and his friendship with Kam.

16.SummaryEnglish: Ginkai rediscovers the friendship of his first Medabot, Bayonet, but will he put that friendship in jeopardy by answering Kam's challenge?

17.SummaryEnglish: When Kam's new Kilobot clasps on to Metabee it's a race to save him from the Kilobot's self destruction. Will they succeed?

18.SummaryEnglish: Forbidden to Robattle until he gets a good mark.  Ikki decides to cheat on his test... but things go from bad to worse when the plan backfires.

19.SummaryEnglish: We learn through our mistakes...as Ikki does out on the soccer pitch...but we also realize that our friends will always be behind us...even after we mess up!

20.SummaryEnglish: Kam lures Ikki and Metabee into a trap to ruin their honest reputation and promote the launch of his retail kilobot stores.

21.SummaryEnglish: Erika, Zumi and Ginkai help prove Ikki and Metabee's innocence but will they survive Kam's latest trap?

22.SummaryEnglish: Kam promises to terrorize the entire school until the Mystery Medafighter comes forward. Will Zuru reveal his secret identity?

23.SummaryEnglish: Embracing change is hard, but resisting it is harder.

24.SummaryEnglish: Banjo attacks Ikki and Metabee at Miss Nae's warehouse in an effort to flush out the Mystery Medafighter and destroy Tyrelbeetle.

25.SummaryEnglish: It's not what you've got... but what you do with it!

26.SummaryEnglish: Erika interviews her friends for an article in the Riverview Reader.  But will it be a glowing review or an expose?

27.TitleEnglish: How Spyke Got His Style Back
27.SummaryEnglish: Spyke is so desperate to copy someone else's robattling style that he doesn't realize he has his own strategies hidden inside him the whole time.

28.SummaryEnglish: Suzie challenges Erika to a grueling obstacle race known as the Straight Line Marathon.  But will the challenge prove too much for both of the competitors?

29.SummaryEnglish: With a robattle against Ginkai looming, and no ammunition, will Ikki and Metabee come up with a solution?

30.SummaryEnglish: Two of Kam's followers, Minitora and Kintora, ambush Ikki  and Erika at the amusement park.  Can Ikki and Erika stop arguing long enough to defeat these new rivals?

31.TitleEnglish: Rough on a Hot Tin Cat
31.SummaryEnglish: If at first you DO succeed... sit the second one out.

32.SummaryEnglish: Kam forces Blakbeetle to try summoning the Medaforce.  But how can she when it would be based on a friendship she doesn't have with Kam?

33.SummaryEnglish: Banjo challenges Ikki and Metabee to Robattle but can he be trusted to play by the rules and accept the true spirit of Medafighting?

34.SummaryEnglish: The best way to deal with a problem is to confront it head-on...Zuru won't get his father to come home for dinner by secretly destroying all the kilobots his Dad has ever built...

35.TitleEnglish: Winner Take All [aka- Medabots Are Friends](2)
35.SummaryEnglish: Zuru finally reveals his identity as the Mystery Medafighter and challenges Kam and his followers to a robattle.

36.SummaryEnglish: In order to have rivalry one must first have a rival!

37.SummaryEnglish: Kam inserts Blakbeetle's Neo-Evil Medal into Gryphon and begins Gryphon's weapons test.  Transformed into Gryphon, Blakbeetle experiences fear for the first time and runs away from Kam.  Kam anticipates her escape and has thus attached a transmitter to her body.  He orders his followers to find her.

38.SummaryEnglish: The kids attempt to rescue Blakbeetle from a horrible fate, but can they convince her to leave Kam?

39.SummaryEnglish: Ikki and friends sneak into the research institute of the Evil Medabot Corporation to rescue Blakbeetle.  Kam says he will return Blakbeetle's medal to her if Ikki and his friends win a fight against Gryphon.
